pkgmetadata.longdescription: SVD-Based Estimation for Exploratory Item Factor Analysis // Provides singular value decomposition based estimation algorithms for exploratory item factor analysis (IFA) based on multidimensional item response theory models. For more information, please refer to: Zhang, H., Chen, Y., Li, X. (2020). A note on exploratory item factor analysis by singular value decomposition. Psychometrika, 1-15, DOI:10.1007/s11336-020-09704-7.
